title: 'I’m still in better shape than your average 40-year-old': Mike Tindall on how life has changed after rugby
text:
He may have left the roar of the crowds behind, but former England rugby star Mike Tindall now gets his kicks from his beloved motorbike.

He married the Queen’s horse-mad granddaughter Zara Phillips but former England rugby player Mike Tindall is more interested in getting on a motorcycle than saddling up a horse.

Although Tindall, a key member of England’s victorious Rugby World Cup squad of 2003, had to wait until his international career was over before he trusted himself enough to ride a Harley-Davidson on the road.

"It’s a very different kind of adrenalin to playing rugby – plus I’m also nowhere near as proficient on a bike as I was on the pitch," says Tindall." When you’re waiting to...
description: He may have left the roar of the crowds behind, but former England rugby star Mike Tindall now gets his kicks from his beloved motorbike.
